Question: This person found out about Temple (as he called him), his only patrilineal grandson, on his second mission to England.
Hints: In 1730, at the age of 24, this person publicly acknowledged an illegitimate son named William, and raised him in his household.
According to David Morgan, this person was a proponent of religion in general.
